apnsPushTopic.description: The push topic assigned to this enrollment by Apple after uploading the Signed CSR plist.

depServerTokenState.description: The state of the dep server token, presence and expiry.

id.description: ObjectId uniquely identifying an MDM Enrollment,

name.description: A friendly name to identify this enrollment.  Not required to be unique.

apnsCertExpiry.description: The expiration date and time for the APNS Certificate.

depAccessTokenExpiry.description: The expiration date and time for the DEP Access Token. This aligns with the DEP Server Token State.

defaultSystemGroupID.description: ObjectId uniquely identifying the MDM default System Group.

title.description: The title to display on the DEP Welcome Screen.

paragraph.description: A message to display on the DEP Welcome Screen.

button.description: Text to display on the button on the DEP Welcome Screen.

option.title: Setup Assistant Option
option.description:
Options to skip screens during MacOS setup:
* `accessibility` - Skips the Accessibility pane, only if the Mac is connected to Ethernet and the cloud config is downloaded.
* `appearance` - Skips the Choose Your Look screen.
* `appleID` - Skips Apple ID setup.
* `biometric` - Skips biometric setup.
* `diagnostics` - Skips the App Analytics pane.
* `displayTone` - Skips display tone setup.
* `fileVault` - Skips FileVault setup assistant screen.
* `icloudDiagnostics` - Skips iCloud analytics screen.
* `icloudStorage` - Skips iCloud documents and desktop screen.
* `location` - Skips location services setup.
* `payment` - Skips Apple Pay setup.
* `privacy` - Skips the Privacy setup.
* `restore` - Skips restoring from backup.
* `screenTime` - Skips screen time setup.
* `siri` - Skips Siri setup.
* `tos` - Skips terms and conditions.

enableZeroTouchEnrollment.description: A toggle to determine if DEP registered devices should go through JumpCloud Zero Touch Enrollment.

allowMobileUserEnrollment.description: A toggle to allow mobile device enrollment for an organization.
